author: Special Correspondent
text:
A few faculty members of Pondicherry Engineering College on Wednesday laid siege to the office of principal demanding promotion to them.

According to them, teachers were promoted to next level such as Assistant professor, Associate- professor and Professor after the completion of interviews. Such practice was adopted in 2013 and 2014.

However, for the year 2015, the interview was conducted only last month after it was deferred several times.

No orders given yet

Senior professors from IIT, NIT and Central Universities were called to assess the eligible teachers for promotion.

Even after the interview was over, the orders for promotion were not given so far, the protesters alleged.

Following talks with the Secretary of Higher Education, they called off their agitation on Wednesday evening.
title: Engineering professors seek promotion
